title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Applying Hindu Traditional Philosophy for Organizational Learning Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply core concepts of Hindu philosophy (such as dharma, karma, etc.) to the context of modern organizational learning.
Learners achieve a completion rate of over 85% through mobile-delivered microlearning content.
Learners demonstrate the ability to design Hindu tradition-based organizational learning strategies by scoring 70 points or higher on the summative assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
